c74object.name: crow
c74object.description: Connect to the crow eurorack module via USB: send and receive CV, talk to other devices connected to crow via I2C, send Lua chunks to execute immediately, and send scripts to load into crow's flash.

outlet.description: Output from crow executing print() commands

method.name: tell_crow [variable]
method.digest: Tell crow to execute a command.
method.description: Tell crow to immediately execute a Lua chunk sent as a symbol (i.e. wrapped in quote), restart (^^r or ^^restart), enter bootloader (^^b or ^^bootloader), start/end receiving a series of Lua chunks to be written into the user script in flash memory (^^s/^e or ^^startscript/^^endscript), print the user script (^^p or ^^printscript), clear the user script (^^c or ^^clearscript).

method.name: get_cv [variable]
method.digest: Check channel 1 or 2's CV and send a message out the left outlet.

method.name: change_cv [variable]
method.digest: Check channel 1 or 2's state and output a 1 or 0.

method.name: ^^v
method.digest: ^^v or ^^version fetches crow's current firmware version.

method.name: ^^s
method.digest: ^^s or ^^startscript: sets crow to reception mode. following code will be saved to a buffer.

method.name: ^^e
method.digest: ^^e or ^^endscript: buffered code will be error-checked, eval'd, and written to flash. crow returns to repl mode.

method.name: ^^c
method.digest: ^^c or ^^clearscript: clears onboard flash without touching lua. use this if your script is crashing crow.

method.name: ^^p
method.digest: ^^p or ^^printscript: requests crow to print the current user script saved in flash over usb to the host. prints a warning if no user script exists.

method.name: ^^b
method.digest: ^^b or ^^bootloader: jump directly to the bootloader.

method.name: ^^r
method.digest: ^^r or ^^reset / ^^restart: reboots crow (not just lua env). nb: causes usb connection to be reset.
